sourcesContent:
import { useState,useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function AddMedicament() { const [med, setmed] = useState({ nameMed: "", weight: "", stock: "", pillForm: "", description: "", lot: "", expDate: "", }); function addedMed(numeMedicament, greutateMedicament,stocMedicament, formaPastilaMedicament, descriereMedicament, lotMedicamment, expDateMedicamment){ axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/medicaments", { Nume:numeMedicament, Gramaj:greutateMedicament, Stoc:stocMedicament, Forma_pastila:formaPastilaMedicament, Descriere:descriereMedicament, Lot:lotMedicamment, Data_expirare:expDateMedicamment}) .then((response) => { setmed(response.data); }); } useEffect(() => { addedMed(); }, []); const changeMed = (e) => { setmed({ ...med, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; return (

Medicament Information

); } export default AddMedicament;
